title: Full-Time Sales & Admin Assistant
job_overview:
We are looking for a confident, self-motivated Sales & Admin Assistant to join our fast-paced, service-based company. You’ll be the frontline communicator for our clients — handling onboarding, sales calls, and daily admin tasks. You must be comfortable speaking with clients, closing sales, and managing a dynamic workload.

This is a dedicated role — you must NOT be working with any other clients or companies.

Key Responsibilities:
 • Lead client onboarding and follow-up
 • Handle inbound and outbound sales consultations
 • Answer calls and respond to client inquiries
 • Manage CRM tasks and maintain accurate documentation
 • Help generate and follow up with leads
 • Post and engage on social media accounts
 • Support the business owner with day-to-day admin needs

Compensation:
 • Base Pay: $200/month
 • Tiered Commission (per client signed):
 • 1–5 clients: $25 each
 • 6–10 clients: $50 each
 • 11+ clients: $75 each
 • No cap on earnings — your income grows with your performance

**Benefits available after 90 days of employment**

To Apply (Must Use 8 Apply Points):

Use the subject line:
Your First Name (Water2Whale)

Include the following 6 items (ALL required to be considered):
 1. Years of Sales Experience
 2. Availability to Start
 3. Social Media Experience (brief summary)
 4. Voice Recording (1–2 minutes introducing yourself — Loom or Vocaroo preferred)
 5. Brief paragraph about how you handle objections during a sales call
 6. Confirm you’re not working with any other employer or client

???? Applicants who do not follow all directions will be automatically disqualified.
